messages.subject: Re: Melanie - no longer in Japan (YES!!!!!!)
messages.msgSnippet: ... *Thank you! How long were you living in  Japan? *Five years (too long) ... *He s Japanese. If you don t mind sharing, where did you ... *Kyushu and Tokyo
messages.messageBody:
> Welcome back to the states, Melanie!
*Thank you!

How long were you living in Japan?
*Five years (too long)

> Did your dh's job take you there?
*He's Japanese.
If you don't mind sharing, where did you
> live,
*Kyushu and Tokyo

and what was it like there?
*"If you can't say something nice... ..."

:-)

Melanie - no longer in Japan!

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Melanie - no longer in Japan (YES!!!!!!)
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/17/00 8:08:15 AM Central Daylight Time, vouget@hotmail.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/17/00 8:08:15 AM Central Daylight Time,
vouget@... writes:

<< Anyway, I'm so happy to be back in the States. DH is still in Japan
looking for a job here.

>>
Welcome back to the states, Melanie! How long were you living in Japan?
Did your dh's job take you there? If you don't mind sharing, where did you
live, and what was it like there? Hope I'm not being too nosy! ~Karen
